result.reason: Users expect custom panel layouts (split views, named panels) to persist across sessions; existing DockPanel save/load infrastructure exists but doesn't fully restore custom connection panels.
result.approach: Extend DockPanelLayoutSaver/Loader to serialize and deserialize custom connection panel names and dock positions, restoring them on startup before reconnecting sessions to their assigned panels.

attempts.raw_output:
This is a feature request to persist custom panel layouts (user-created panels and their dock positions) across sessions. The app already has `DockPanelLayoutSaver`/`DockPanelLayoutLoader` infrastructure but doesn't fully restore custom connection panels and their positions.

```json
{"decision":"implement","reason":"Users expect custom panel layouts (split views, named panels) to persist across sessions; existing DockPanel save/load infrastructure exists but doesn't fully restore custom connection panels.","priority":"P3-enhancement","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Config/Settings/DockPanelLayoutSaver.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Settings/DockPanelLayoutLoader.cs","mRemoteNG/Config/Settings/DockPanelLayoutSerializer.cs","mRemoteNG/UI/Forms/frmMain.cs"],"approach":"Extend DockPanelLayoutSaver/Loader to serialize and deserialize custom connection panel names and dock positions, restoring them on startup before reconnecting sessions to their assigned panels."}
```
